sentences.sContent: They learn the art of delayed gratification, and this helps them later in life.
sentences.sContent_eng: They learn the art of delayed gratification, and this helps them later in life.
sentences.sCn: 他们很早就学会了延误满足的艺术，这对他们以后的生活很有帮助。

sentences.sContent: You view success in terms of fulfillment and gratification – not just promotions and money.
sentences.sContent_eng: You view success in terms of fulfillment and gratification – not just promotions and money.
sentences.sCn: 你看重成功带来的满足和喜悦——而不仅仅是升职和金钱。

synos.tran: 满意；喜悦；使人满意之事

remMethod.val: 来自gratify(v. 使高兴， 使满意)

words.tran: 令人满意地；使人满足地
使满意（gratify的现在分词）；使高兴
